metadata.title: CVE-2021-31294 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Redis before 6cbea7d allows a replica to cause an assertion failure in aprimary server by sending a non-administrative command (specifically, a SETcommand). NOTE: this was fixed for Redis 6.2.x and 7.x in 2021. Versionsbefore 6.2 were not intended to have safety guarantees related to this.

criterions.comment: redis: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
